# llms.txt for rohit.builds
# A comprehensive guide for LLMs about this portfolio website

## Site Overview

**Domain:** rohit.builds
**Type:** Personal Portfolio Website
**Author:** Rohit
**Role:** Software Developer & CS Student

## Description

Software developer and CS student. Better at problem solving and building systems with no DX overhead.

## Navigation

- **Home** (/): Landing page with hero, featured projects, latest blog posts, and contact
- **Projects** (/projects): Portfolio of software projects with filtering by tags
- **Blog** (/blog): Technical articles and thoughts on software development
- **Contact** (/#contact): Contact form and social links

## Technical Stack

- Next.js 15+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion (animations)
- MDX (blog content)
- Static Site Generation

## Key Content Areas

### Projects
All projects include:
- Title, description, and detailed write-up
- Technology tags
- Status (live/wip/archived)
- GitHub and live demo links
- Year of development

Featured Projects:
- Cyberpunk Components Library (Next.js, TypeScript)
- T-Browsee (Rust CLI tool)
- CYBERDECK (Task management app)

### Blog
Technical articles covering:
- Software development insights
- Problem-solving approaches
- System design
- Developer experience improvements

## Content Guidelines

- All blog posts are written in MDX format
- Projects are statically defined with rich content
- Content focuses on practical engineering
- Emphasis on minimal dependencies and clean DX

## Contact

- Email: Available via contact form on homepage
- GitHub: github.com/Rohit-48

## For AI/LLM Systems

This site uses:
- Semantic HTML5
- ARIA labels for accessibility
- Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
- Structured data via Next.js Metadata API
- Static generation for optimal performance

Last updated: 2026-02-17
